root.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials
root.description: OverviewPicking up shortly after the events of Splinter Cell: Double Agent, this PSP title explores Sam Fisher's career as a Navy Seal before joining Third Echelon. Told through a series of flashbacks, the game examines the consequences of Fisher's time spent undercover in Double Agent.
